conversion_verification.notes: A valid 3D transformation occurred, but the spatial content does not match the input plan.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Solid 3D execution with clear wall height, thickness, and isometric perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Critical failure. The 3D render represents an entirely different floor plan (kitchen/living/garage) compared to the input (3-bedroom apartment/upper floor).

interior_elements.notes: Furniture (dining table, sofas, car) bears no resemblance to the programmed rooms in the 2D plan (beds, bathroom fixtures, stairs).

visual_clarity.notes: The render itself is clean and readable, but functionally irrelevant to the source.

detected_errors.description: The layout is completely uncorrelated; 3D contains a garage and kitchen not present in the 2D plan; 2D bedrooms and balcony are missing.

summary: While a high-quality 3D render was generated, it represents a completely different floor plan than the one provided in the source image.
